title: The Biggest Space Stories of 2023
description: Even amid an avalanche of AI news, space exploration still managed to make headlines this year.

title: Cryptocurrency Analyst Predicts XRP to Break Past $1.2 Pre-Bitcoin Halving
description: The price of XRP, the native token of the XRP Ledger, has surged by more than 85% this year amid a wider cryptocurrency market recovery, to now trade at $0.62 per token, below its year-to-date high of around $0.95. According to available market data, XRP hit its high for the year after US Federal Judge [â€¦]
